Reference

GIS utilities

Functions for working with GIS data and maps

reproject_coordinates()

Reproject x-y coordinates from data.frame columns.

guess_projection()

Take a dataset and plot in different projections on a leaflet map to check the expected projection

plot_coordinates_on_map()

Plot x/y coordinates on a map

Plot utilities

Functions for working with plots

plot_label_splitter()

Split a long (plot) label into a two-liner

GBIF interaction utilities

Functions for working with GBIF data, beyond rgbif functionalities

gbif_species_name_match()

Add species information provided by the GBIF taxonomic backbone API

Data loaders

Functions to download/read data or specific data formats

connect_inbo_dbase()

Connect to an INBO database

read_mow_data()

Read MOW data

download_knmi_data_hour()

Download KNMI hourly data to file

download_zenodo()

Get data from a Zenodo archive

read_knmi_data()

Read KNMI datafile (precipitation) as data.frame

read_kmi_data()

Load KMI data as data.frame

read_kml_file()

Extract date and coordinate information from Google Maps kml file

INBOVEG data interaction

Functions to read data from INBOVEG database

inboveg_classification()

Query classification information from INBOVEG

inboveg_header()

Query header information from INBOVEG

inboveg_qualifiers()

Query qualifier information of recordings (relevé) from INBOVEG

inboveg_recordings()

Query recording (relevé) information from INBOVEG

inboveg_survey()

Query survey information from INBOVEG

Florabank data interaction

Functions to read data from Florabank database

florabank_observations()

Get all validated observations for one or more taxa from the florabank database

florabank_taxon_ifbl_year()

Get unique combinations of taxon, IFBL-square and year.

florabank_traits()

Query the florabank to get taxon trait values for (a) taxon trait(s)

Tidy data and data.frame handling

Functions to support work with data.frames

df_factors_to_char()

Convert all factors of a dataframe to characters

csv_to_sqlite()

Save a delimited text table into a single table sqlite database

Statistical modelling

Functions for handling statistical modelling tasks

vif()

Variance inflation factor

Example datasets

coordinate_example

Example data.frame with coorindates

species_example

Example data.frame with species name column
